contested.description: If the normalized label part of this index is less than 20 characters (all alphabet a-z, A-Z, 0, 1, and -) then a masternode vote contest takes place to give out the name

normalizedLabel.description: Domain label converted to lowercase for case-insensitive uniqueness validation. "o", "i" and "l" replaced with "0" and "1" to mitigate homograph attack. e.g. 'b0b'
normalizedLabel.$comment: Must be equal to the label in lowercase. "o", "i" and "l" must be replaced with "0" and "1".

parentDomainName.description: A full parent domain name. e.g. 'dash'.

normalizedParentDomainName.description: A parent domain name in lowercase for case-insensitive uniqueness validation. "o", "i" and "l" replaced with "0" and "1" to mitigate homograph attack. e.g. 'dash'
normalizedParentDomainName.$comment: Must either be equal to an existing domain or empty to create a top level domain. "o", "i" and "l" must be replaced with "0" and "1". Only the data contract owner can create top level domains.

preorderSalt.description: Salt used in the preorder document

identity.description: Identifier name record that refers to an Identity

allowSubdomains.description: This option defines who can create subdomains: true - anyone; false - only the domain owner
allowSubdomains.$comment: Only the domain owner is allowed to create subdomains for non top-level domains

subdomainRules.description: Subdomain rules allow domain owners to define rules for subdomains

domain.$comment: In order to register a domain you need to create a preorder. The preorder step is needed to prevent man-in-the-middle attacks. normalizedLabel + '.' + normalizedParentDomain must not be longer than 253 chars length as defined by RFC 1035. Domain documents are immutable: modification and deletion are restricted

saltedDomainHash.description: Double sha-256 of the concatenation of a 32 byte random salt and a normalized domain name

preorder.$comment: Preorder documents are immutable: modification and deletion are restricted
